name: New Eitango Target 1900 DS
summary: New Eitango Target 1900 DS is an educational English language learning game based on the Eitango Target series of books by Obunsha. These books teach a common set of English words in order to help students pass the TOEIC English language proficiency test. This game, specifically, is based on the Eitango Target 1900 book which teaches 1900 common English words.
